divs: sighting detailsthis is an incident that has happend 2 times and has happend again, last time at about dec 23 one light was in a position of about 100 to 50 feet south of our property in our hill on our back property and it was like if someone had a flash light in the trees and was walking up there, but it was odd it didn't move for about 10-12 sec lighting up and fading out, then it stopped and about 3 sec later i had to of jumped 400 to 500 feet north and sat in a position half a mile away from the top of the hill and after that it stopped again and 5 sec later it exited the atmosphere in a j like direction north from where it was at, this morning it was moving with a flash fade motion and is going towards whats called mt. godfry, today 5\14\12 at around 11:30 to 12:30 pm a friend saw another but it had a sun like shape and it ascended and descended behind our hill. before coming over.
Summary: Fading lights seen by 2 in the hills on property.
Object Flight Path: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
trends: There has been one other sighting in Tum Tum
There were no other sightings in Tum Tum on or around April 29th 2012
